brand_info.name: Google
brand_info.tagline: Organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
brand_info.positioning: Consumer-facing technology brand focused on helpful, accessible products and services that make information and everyday tasks easier.
brand_info.vision: Organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
brand_info.mission: Organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin, originating from research at Stanford University and incorporated as Google Inc. in 1998.

brand_values.brand_promise: Make products and services that are simple, useful, and accessible, helping people find information and get things done.
differentiators: Ecosystem of integrated tools and services
non_negotiables: Respect user trust and privacy expectations

psychographics.lifestyle: Broad mainstream users across work, learning, entertainment, travel, and everyday life
psychographics.behavior: Uses digital tools daily; expects fast, intuitive experiences; values trustworthy, helpful guidance and frictionless workflows

logo.primary_logo: Google wordmark in Product Sans / Google Sans with multicolor letterforms
logo.usage_rules: Use approved logo assets only; maintain clear space; do not distort, recolor, or add effects; avoid placing on busy backgrounds that reduce legibility
logo.lockup_behavior: Centered or top-left aligned depending on layout; consistent clear space and optical alignment
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the lowercase 'o' in the wordmark (or equivalent proportional clear space when scaled)

color_system.color_usage_rules: Use brand colors as purposeful accents and signals, not as decorative patterns; prioritize clarity, accessibility, and sufficient contrast; backgrounds typically white or light neutral

hierarchy: Captions – Smaller sans with clear contrast

layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Function-led: UI and product moments balanced with concise copy
layout_principles.cta_placement: Contextual and minimal; typically below or adjacent to the primary message
layout_principles.alignment: Clean, left-aligned for information; centered for brand moments; consistent rhythm and padding

preferred_photographers: Varies by campaign; prioritize consistent, naturalistic lifestyle photography aligned with accessibility and inclusivity
style.camera_feel: Natural, documentary-leaning lifestyle with controlled cleanliness; occasional product-centric, studio-clean imagery for hardware
style.pose_guidelines: Natural gestures, purposeful interaction with devices or services; approachable expressions; minimal over-posed fashion attitude
style.casting_attitude: Broad inclusivity across ages and backgrounds; friendly, relatable, contemporary

technical.lighting: Soft natural daylight or bright, diffused studio light; avoid harsh shadows unless used for clarity and separation
technical.color_grading: Neutral with gentle warmth; true-to-life skin tones; brand colors used as accents in props, UI, or wardrobe

preferred_locations: Simple studio backdrops for product focus

model_casting.diversity: Yes, explicitly inclusive across age, ability, ethnicity, and body types

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Clear and legible; product or UI is understandable at a glance
product_presentation.styling_approach: Simple, contemporary, comfort-forward; wardrobe supports clarity and inclusivity without trend signaling
avoid: Busy visual noise that reduces comprehension
Visuals that imply unsafe or misleading outcomes

motion_rules.pacing: Smooth and easy; micro-animations and transitions that feel helpful and calm
motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts; gentle fades; UI-like easing; minimal visual gimmicks

visual_dos: Use clean whitespace and clear hierarchy
Use brand colors as functional accents
visual_donts: Decorative misuse of Google colors or patterns
Overly dramatic, high-contrast grading that harms readability
copy_dos: Focus on user benefit and clarity

test_zone: Seasonal campaigns with controlled brand guardrails

digital.tone_adjustment: More instructional in help/docs; more inspirational in product launches; always clarity-first

platform_behavior.Instagram: Short, clear story arcs with friendly captions; product and people moments
platform_behavior.Website: Whitespace-led layouts, strong hierarchy, accessible typography, clear CTAs
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Concise, benefit-led modules; clear links; minimal clutter

print.paper: Uncoated or lightly coated stock with clean reproduction
print.cover_rules: Simple hero image or brand mark; high legibility; minimal copy

logo_misuse_examples: Placing the logo on low-contrast or busy backgrounds
Using Google brand colors as decorative patterns implying affiliation
